thread.title: Former Trump campaign aide Nunberg faces grand jury

title: Former Trump campaign aide Nunberg faces grand jury
text:
Former Trump campaign aide Nunberg faces grand jury 9:54am EST - 00:28 
Former Donald Trump campaign aide Sam Nunberg, who had balked at testifying in the investigation of Russian meddling in the 2016 presidential campaign, appeared at the federal courthouse in Washington on Friday as part of Special Counsel Robert Mueller's probe. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
